Practice Areas

At VMG Business Advisory PLLC, I provide targeted legal services designed to support businesses, founders, funds, and investors through all stages of growth and transactions. My experience includes:

Corporate Governance

Advising companies, boards, and executives on governance matters, fiduciary duties, corporate structure, and internal policies to ensure compliant and effective management.

Private Placements & Securities

Structuring and documenting private offerings of securities, including early-stage equity rounds, convertible notes, SAFE instruments, and compliance with federal and state securities regulations.

Mergers & Acquisitions

Handling business purchase and sale transactions, including asset purchases, stock sales, mergers, joint ventures, and complex negotiation of deal terms.

Venture Capital & SAFE Negotiation

Counseling startup founders and venture investors in negotiating investment rounds, including seed, Series A, and later-stage financing transactions using SAFE agreements, convertible notes, or priced equity rounds.

Start-Up Counseling

Providing strategic legal counsel to startups on entity formation, founder agreements, intellectual property protection, contract negotiation, and general business matters. Beyond counseling on legal issues, I provide broader advice for startups regarding best practices and strategy for effectively managing and building a business.

Professional Service Entities

Advising regulated professional service firms on entity formation, mergers and acquisitions, ongoing regulatory compliance, ownership structuring, and transactional matters specific to licensed professions.

Outside General Counsel Services

Serving as trusted ongoing legal counsel to businesses without full-time in-house counsel, assisting with commercial contracts, employment matters, regulatory compliance, and day-to-day legal issues.
